disclaimer.amazon: We are a participant in the Amazon Associates Program, an affiliate advertising program designed to provide a means for us to earn fees by linking to Amazon and affiliated sites.

welcome.shortDescription: Monitor products, and get notified when their price drops.
welcome.shopWisely: Shop more wisely, and know when prices drop. That's when you can act!

features.monitor_title: Monitor your product on multiple stores
features.monitor_description: In a single alert, you can monitor a specific product on multiple websites. Or, you can monitor a general item and follow multiple versions of it!
features.notifications_title: Get notified when the price drops
features.notifications_description: Get notified by email when the product you want is on sale, or in clearance. Mucho dinero saved!
features.history_title: See the price history of a product
features.history_description: Analyse the patterns, see when the prices raised or dropped, and act accordingly.
features.sources_description: You can monitor products from these websites. More will be added!
features.lists_description: Organize your products into categories of your choice: Christmas wish list, birthday gifts, books to buy. Customize as you like!

blog.description: We will talk about shopping strategies, app features, and the technology behind PriceWise

chrome.description: Create alerts directly from your product page on our supported websites!

errors.sourceNotSupported: The specified store is not yet supported.
errors.parseError: There was a problem parsing the product page.

alert.title: Back to alerts
alert.emailOption: Receive email notifications for this product

alerts.title: Alert
alerts.priceDrop: Alert me when the best price of a product drops
alerts.priceRaise: Alert me when the best price of a product raises

unsubscribe.changedYourMind: You can always reactivate notifications by going to the alert page.
